channel.title: 3rd click npc?
channel.description:
....i was wondering..... since there is a 1st click npc and a 2nd click npc..... is there supposed to be a 3rd click npc? cause some npcs have a 3rd option......
if so can you tell me how to make a 3rd click npc case..... cause i don't have one..... i think..........

item.title: 3rd click npc?
item.dc:creator: @Haxor_X Haxor X
item.description:
@Haxor_X wrote:

i do figure things out on my own…
mostly because i am forced to…
since this commuinity really doesn’t help much…
everytime i got an error i never got any help on fixing it…
had to do everything on my own…-.-
well if you won’t tell me i guess i’ll just have to do this alone also then…
sigh

Read full topic

item.title: 3rd click npc?
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

Here’s a tip: want to make something work? Find out how it already works in your client.
example: I wanted make x bows to work, so I looked at the case for bank x, and figured it out. A simple intreval. You should try exploring and figuring things out for yourself. Start with editing existing things, then add your own when you feel comfortable.
~Le

Read full topic
